name: Content Circles
tag_list: team-collaboration, extranet, virtual-data-room, virtual-deal-room, ftp-replacement, large-file-transfer, secure-file-transfer, enterprise-2-0, p2p, saas
overview:
Content Circles provides collaborative workspaces for securely sharing and managing files of any size and type, within and across firewalls, online and offline … all right from your Mac or PC.

Content Circles uses a unique hybrid web/p2p approach to make sharing and managing files across firewalls seamless, secure and auditable.

Key benefits include:

  • Automatic encryption and replication of content across membersâ€™ computers to keep everyone always on the same page â€“ 100% secure and confidential
  • Complete version and action history, including comments, tagging and instant messaging
  • Send and receive files of any size â€“ no need for FTP, or burning and shipping CDs/DVDs
  • Access to content even when offline â€“ work anytime, anywhere
  • Ability to setup a â€œPrivate Team Cloudâ€ for automatic backup and offline content exchange
    • Cross-platform â€“ Mac and Windows now; Linux coming soon
  • Email notifications keep everyone â€“ including iPhone and BlackBerry users â€“ on the same page
  • Out-of-the-box integration with enterprise content management (ECM) systems such as Microsoft SharePoint, Xerox DocuShare and Alfresco Enterprise
  • Instant deployment â€“ small footprint, no IT required

Content Circlesâ€™ business model requires only the team leader to be a paid subscriber ($9.95 per month or $99.50 per year); team members collaborate for free within the Circle (or workspace) created by the team leader.

milestones.description: Content Circles IP acquired on March 14, 2011.  Current service to shutdown on April 21, 2011.
